Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product offers unparalleled performance and quality, making it an exceptional investment for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth considering at a special introductory price of $7500. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to others. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this product can positively impact your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
